product_name: Nite Ize Clip Case Sideways Phone Holster - X Large
long_description: The extra-large Nite Ize Clip Case Sideways Phone Holster is designed to fit on your belt in a fixed horizontal position-perfect for rugged work or play environments. Designed to fit larger format smartphones, with or without form-fit cases. Your phone stays secure with a durable rip-and-stick closure; interior pocket provides a handy place to store ID, credit cards, or cash. Made of impact-resistant ballistic nylon and accented with weather-resistant Hypalon(TM) material. Rugged flex clip ensures confident attachment to waistbands, belts, or straps up to 2-3/16 in. wide. The Nite Ize Clip Case Sideways Phone Holster measures 6.2 x 3.6 x 1.6 in.
short_description: The extra-large Nite Ize Clip Case Sideways Phone Holster is designed to fit on your belt in a fixed horizontal position-perfect for rugged work or play environments.
